description: Select the desired world collection by clicking on the appropriate button.
Introduction Reeborg is the collection of worlds normally shown initially when accessing this site.
These worlds can be and should be solved using only functions
with no arguments, and without using variables, following the
Saskatchewan CS 20 is a collection adapted from the worlds used in the
Computer Science 20 open textbook created by Dan Schellenberg.
Some worlds are identical to that of Reeborg's introduction.
Print exercises is a collection of exercises to help beginners learn to use print() or its Javascript equivalent.
Varia is a collection of various worlds to be sorted later; constantly in flux.
Note that the reorganization of worlds into different collections is not completed.
